snippet: Critics on the left and the right have seized on Secretary of State John Kerry’s use of “boots on the ground” and “unbelievably small.”
abstract: Diplomatic Memo; Sec of State John Kerry makes contradictory statements over plans to strike Syria, first promising 'boots on the ground' in conflict, and later saying strike would be 'unbelievably small'; critics seize on comments as proof of Pres Obama's ambivalence and that it would be a slippery slope to another American war in the Middle East.
lead_paragraph: Critics on the left and the right have seized on Secretary of State John Kerry’s use of “boots on the ground” and “unbelievably small.”

headline.print_headline: Diplomatic Memo: Making Administration’s Case, Kerry Finds Six Words That Spell Trouble
headline.main: Making Administration’s Case, Kerry Finds Six Words That Spell Trouble
